features.name: Maintenance Free
features.description: Once installed, Clicklad will never require any maintenance to maintain its rich look

features.name: Scratch Resistant
features.description: Clicklad is very durable and withstands scratches from other objects

features.name: Non-Combustible
features.description: Clicklad is non-combustible and can be installed where non-combustible material is required

features.name: Eco-Friendly
features.description: Made from sustainable materials, reducing environmental impact.
